repositories.name: MvvmCross
repositories.label: first-timers-only
repositories.description: The .NET MVVM framework for cross-platform solutions, including Xamarin.iOS, Xamarin.Android, Windows and Mac.

repositories.name: FastAPI
repositories.label: good first issue
repositories.description: A modern, fast (high-performance) web framework for building APIs with Python 3.6+ based on standard Python type hints.

repositories.name: React
repositories.label: good first issue
repositories.description: A declarative, efficient, and flexible JavaScript library for building user interfaces.

repositories.name: TensorFlow
repositories.label: stat:contributions-welcome
repositories.description: Computation using data flow graphs for scalable machine learning.

design_patterns.name: Decorator
design_patterns.description: Used to dynamically add behavior or responsibilities to an object.
design_patterns.example_usage: Enhance repository descriptions with metadata dynamically.

design_patterns.name: Factory
design_patterns.description: Used to create objects without specifying the exact class of object that will be created.
design_patterns.example_usage: Abstract repository initialization based on technology.

design_patterns.name: Observer
design_patterns.description: Defines a one-to-many dependency between objects so that when one object changes state, all its dependents are notified.
design_patterns.example_usage: Track changes in repositories and notify users about updates.

design_patterns.name: Strategy
design_patterns.description: Defines a family of algorithms, encapsulates each one, and makes them interchangeable.
design_patterns.example_usage: Choose different processing strategies for repository metadata.

design_patterns.name: Adapter
design_patterns.description: Converts the interface of a class into another interface clients expect.
design_patterns.example_usage: Integrate third-party APIs into the repository list.
